articles.title: Title of DPRK Labor Hero Awarded to People's Security Men
articles.content:
Title of DPRK Labor Hero Awarded to People's Security Men
						
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- The title of the DPRK Labor Hero was awarded to Ri Kwang Chol and Ri Chung Gon, people's security men of a unit under the Songrim City People's Security Department of North Hwanghae Province.
					 They laid down their lives without hesitation to rescue workers under unexpected urgent circumstances.
					
					 An awarding ceremony took place in Sariwon City on Friday.
					
					 Present there were Ri Pyong Sam, director of the Political Bureau of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, Pak Thae Dok, chief secretary of the North Hwanghae Provincial Party Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, people's security persons and bereaved families.
					
					 The title of the DPRK Labor Hero and Gold Medal (hammer and sickle) and Order of National Flag First Class awarded to Ri Kwang Chol and Ri Chung Gon were conveyed to their bereaved families at the awarding ceremony.
					
					 Patriotic martyr's certificates were also awarded to the bereaved families.

articles.title: Order of Kim Jong Il Awarded to Units, Persons of Merits
articles.content:
Order of Kim Jong Il Awarded to Units, Persons of Merits
						
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Order of Kim Jong Il was awarded to the Rakwon Machine Complex in North Phyongan Province, the March 5 Youth Mine in Jagang Province, the Kanggye Unha Garment Factory and Migok Co-op Farm in Sariwon City, North Hwanghae Province on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 It also went to Paek Kye Ryong, O Su Yong, Kim Chang Myong, Ro Kyong Jun, Choe Tae Il, Pak Cho Yong, Ryom Chi Gwon, Kang Kil Yong, Mi Chang Guk, Yun Ho Nam, U Tok Su and Ryom U Jun.
					
					 Those units and officials, service persons and people made great contributions to bolstering up the national defence capabilities and building an economic giant through a dynamic drive for consolidating the political and ideological position of the Korean revolution as firm as a rock and devotedly carrying out the lines and policies of the Workers' Party of Korea by rallying the broad masses close around the Party, true to the Songun revolutionary leadership of the Party.
					
					 A decree of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly as regards this conferment was promulgated on February 6.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Prize Goes to Intellectual and Kwangmyong Encyclopedia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Prize Goes to Intellectual and Kwangmyong Encyclopedia 
						
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il Prize was conferred upon  Kim Sang Ok and Kwangmyong Encyclopedia on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 Kim Sang Ok has made a great contribution to the development of the nation's science and technology by displaying intense loyalty to the party and the leader and devoting creative wisdom and enthusiasm. 
					
					 Kwangmyong Encyclopedia helps officials and people raise the levels of political theories and cultural knowledge as required by the building of a thriving socialist nation and the age of knowledge-based economy. 
					
					 A decree of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly on awarding the prize was promulgated on Feb. 6.

articles.title: Munsu Wading Pool to Be Built in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Munsu Wading Pool to Be Built in Pyongyang
						
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- A modern wading pool is to be built in the Munsu area of Pyongyang.
					 Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un gave a series of earnest instructions on building the Munsu Wading Pool at the behest of leader Kim Jong Il and called on the army to undertake the project and demonstrate its might as the army of the party and the people once again.
					
					 KPA service personnel held a meeting on the spot on Thursday to vow to implement to the letter the order given by the supreme commander.
					
					 Minister Kim Kyok Sik and other officials of the People's Armed Forces and service personnel attended the meeting.
					
					 A report was made to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers noted that all the commanding officers and soldiers would creditably carry out their tasks as befitting a revolutionary army that doesn't know such word as impossibility, bearing deep in mind the supreme commander's intention and the importance of the construction.
					
					 They stressed the need to ensure the quality in construction on the highest level under the motto of taking responsibility for the safety of projects and guaranteeing their absolute quality for all eternity by overcoming difficulties and hardships with the same spirit and mettle as were displayed in every work site for the country's prosperity and the people's happiness in the past.
					
					 They called upon all the commanding officers and soldiers to get fully prepared to go into action to foil the ever-more undisguised hostile moves of the U.S. imperialists and their followers against the DPRK and fully demonstrate the invincible might of the heroic KPA taking charge of both national defence and the building of a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Exemplary Primary Information Workers of Youth League Make Study Tour
articles.content:
Exemplary Primary Information Workers of Youth League Make Study Tour 
						
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Exemplary primary information workers of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League from  across the country made a study tour of leader Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan Secret Camp from Feb. 2 to 7 with the approach of his birth anniversary.
					  During the period of study tour, they laid floral baskets and bunches of flowers before the statues of President Kim Il Sung before the Victorious Battle of Pochonbo Memorial Tower, the Pochonbo Revolutionary Battle Site, the Chongbong Bivouac Ground, the shore of Lake Samji and a mosaic depicting the three commanders of Mt. Paektu standing near Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan Secret Camp and paid tribute to them.
					
					  They looked round the then Command Post of the Pochonbo Battle, police post and  the sub-county office of the Japanese imperialists, etc. in Pochonbo.
					
					 They arrived at the secret camp via the Spring Site in Poso-ri, Tableland of Junghung, Phothae Revolutionary Site, Rimyongsu Revolutionary Site and the Chongbong Bivouac Ground and held an oath-taking meeting before the old home of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They expressed their firm will to become ardent fighters who deeply trust and follow the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un in any adversity by learning from the anti-Japanese revolutionary forerunners' spirit of devotedly defending the leader. 
					
					 Being briefed on the fact that Kim Jong Il was born and grew up to be a great man, they looked round historic relics preserved in the old house with care.
					
					 They looked round the Samjiyon Grand Monument and the township which changed its appearance beyond recognition.
					
					 During the study tour they had diverse political and cultural events including a question-and-answer contest on the New Year Address made by Kim Jong Un, meeting to hear impressions of the reminiscences of anti-Japanese guerrillas read by them, contest of singing revolutionary songs while marching in array and recreation gathering.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Decision Stirs Up Morale of Servicepersons
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Decision Stirs Up Morale of Servicepersons
						
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, at the recent enlarged meeting of the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), made an important decision which would serve as guidelines for further strengthening the Korean People's Army (KPA) in keeping with the demands of the WPK and the prevailing situation and defending the security and sovereignty of the country.
					 The news has stirred up the morale of the servicepersons ready to turn out in an all-out action against the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 An Chol Song, a KPA officer, told KCNA:
					
					 "History shows that a nation without strong military capabilities is reduced into a slave of the imperialists eventually.
					
					ã€€I will dedicate myself to the fight to smash the escalating anti-DPRK war moves of the U.S. and its followers and reliably defend the peace and security of the Korean Peninsula."
					
					 Paek Kwak Hyon, a KPA soldier, said:
					
					 "To bolster up the military muscle is the most important state affairs to which a priority should be given consistently as long as imperialism exists on the earth.
					
					 I will do my best to prepare myself to be ready for all combat conditions.
					
					 Final victory is in store for the DPRK led by Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un, who is possessed of rare wisdom and stratagem, matchless grit and pluck and noble virtues."

articles.title: Kumsusan Palace of Sun Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
articles.content:
Kumsusan Palace of Sun Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
						
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- The Kumsusan Memorial Palace was remodeled into the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun, supreme temple of Juche, where great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il lie in state. More than 60 000 service personnel, people, overseas compatriots and foreigners have so far visited it since its opening on Dec. 17, Juche 101 (2012). 
					 This proves that Korean people's and the world progressives' reverence for the Generalissimos is growing deeper as the days go by.
					
					 At least 12 000 people visited the palace in a recent week. 
					
					 There is a hall where the statues of the Generalissimos stand in the palace which was perfectly remodeled into a grand monument for immortality of the leaders in terms of contents, style and scope thanks to the intense loyalty and sense of obligation of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un who is ushering in a new chapter for the cause of immortalizing the leaders. 
					
					 There are the halls of immortality where the Generalissimos lie in state and the halls which house orders they received, cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tour till the last period of their lives.

articles.title: Sports Contest of Officials of National Institutions Closes
articles.content:
Sports Contest of Officials of National Institutions Closes
						
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- The 18th Sports Contest of Officials of National Institutions for Paektusan Prize closed with due ceremony at Pyongyang Indoor Stadium Friday. The contest opened on January 24. 
					 In the contest the players competed in 5 sports events, divided into 4 groups.
					
					 The Ministry of Railways, the Minju Joson, the Taesong Guidance Bureau and the Guidance Bureau of Mining-Machine Industry took first place in men's basketball games while the State Planning Commission, the Korean Revolution Museum, the General Bureau for Service for People and the Foreign Trade Bank won in women's basketball games.
					
					 The Education Commission, the Central Broadcasting Committee of Korea, the Ponghwa Guidance Bureau and the General Bureau of Diplomatic Corps Affairs took first place in men's volleyball games while the Central Bank, the Korean Revolution Museum, the Overseas Construction Guidance Bureau and the General Bureau of Diplomatic Corps Affairs defeated all their rivals in women's volleyball games.
					
					 In tug of war matches the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, the Korean Central News Agency, the Overseas Construction Guidance Bureau, the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries won the first places.
					
					 In the Taekwon-do event the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, the Foreign Languages Publishing House, the Overseas Construction Guidance Bureau and the Maritime Administration of the DPRK came off winners.
					
					 In collective running the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, the Foreign Languages Publishing House, the Overseas Construction Guidance Bureau and the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries outstripped all other teams.
					
					 After all, the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, the Korean Central News Agency, the Overseas Construction Guidance Bureau and the General Bureau of Diplomatic Corps Affairs became winners in total points.

articles.title: National Photo Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
National Photo Exhibition Opens
						
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- A national photo exhibition celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) titled "They Were Always Together to Bring about the People's Well-being" was opened with due ceremony at the Grand People's Study House on Friday.
					 Seen in the venue of the exhibition were photos showing the glorious revolutionary lives of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the history of the revolutionary leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Such photos as "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung and the Great Leader Comrade Kim Jong Il Guide the Sixth Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea" and "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung and the Great Leader Comrade Kim Jong Il Watch the Drill of Soldiers of the Korean People's Army" reflect the leadership feats of the peerlessly great men who bolstered the function of the WPK and the might of the revolutionary armed forces in every way.
					
					 Photos show tireless efforts of the great Generalissimos who devoted themselves to the prosperity of the country and the happiness of the people. They included "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung and the Great Leader Comrade Kim Jong Il Watch Spare Parts of Equipment to Be Sent to Coal Mines" and "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung and the Great Leader Comrade Kim Jong Il Provide Field Guidance of the Construction of the West Sea Barrage".
					
					 There were also photos dealing with the feats the great Generalissimos who led all the Koreans to the road of independence and the great national unity and energetically worked for global peace and stability, friendship and solidarity among the peoples under the uplifted banner of independence against imperialism.
					
					 Seen there were such photos as "The Dear Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Visits the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun and Pays Tribute to Portraits of Smiling Great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il" and "The Dear Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Visits the Satellite Control and Command Center to Observe the Processes of the Launch of Satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2".
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Kim Ki Nam, Yang Hyong Sop, officials concerned and people in the city.

articles.title: National Cooking Competition Held in DPRK
articles.content:
National Cooking Competition Held in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- A national cooking competition was held here from Feb. 6 to 8 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The competition was divided into the fields of public service and service of ministries and national institutions, hotels and provincial public catering and service. Present there were cooks and waitresses of 32 organizations. 
					
					 The competition was held by such methods of experts and masses' judgment of preparations for cooking, sanitation, dressing processes and taste.
					
					 Dishes produced by Okryu Restaurant, Chongryu Restaurant, Kyonghung Guidance Bureau, Pyongyang Koryo Hotel, Pyongyang City, South Hwanghae Province and other units were highly estimated as they showed the advantages of national foods and reflected well their original taste and tradition.

articles.title: Chilhyang Steamed Chicken, Traditional Korean Dish
articles.content:
Chilhyang Steamed Chicken, Traditional Korean Dish
						
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Chilhyang steamed chicken is one of the traditional Korean dishes.
					 According to the history book "Forestry and Economy" released in the period of the Feudal Joson Dynasty (1392-1910), Chilhyang in Korean represents seven kinds of aroma smelled from the steamed chicken.
					
					 The dish is cooked with seven kinds of raw materials, including broad bellflower, ginger, Welsh onion, prickly ash and oil, put into stomach of chicken before being steamed.
					
					 The dish, which has been considered the best of the chicken dishes, is very good for health.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Batters at U.S.-S. Korea Joint Naval Exercises
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Batters at U.S.-S. Korea Joint Naval Exercises 
						
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Warmongers of the U.S. and south Korea staged large-scale joint naval exercises in the East Sea of Korea from Monday to Wednesday, blustering that they "assumed the nature of demonstrating their armed forces against the north". 
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 The recent joint naval maneuvers were staged to create atmosphere of pressure upon the DPRK in the wake of the UN Security Council's adoption of the unjust "resolution on sanctions" against it. This was a grave military provocation aimed at a surprise preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK. 
					
					 What should not be overlooked is the fact that the U.S. nuclear powered submarine San Francisco equipped with Tomahawk cruise missiles with a range of thousands of kilometers was involved in the joint exercises. 
					
					 It is a well-known fact that the nuclear submarine was a main offensive means in the Iraqi and Afghan wars. It had been forward-deployed on the Korean Peninsula at a time when the standoff between the DPRK and the U.S. was most acute in the last century. It reappeared in the waters off south Korea 19 years later to take part in the war maneuvers staged under the simulated conditions of invasion of the DPRK. This brought into bolder relief the provocative nature and danger of the recent saber-rattling. 
					
					 Anti-submarine, anti-warship, anti-air drills, naval mobile and live-shell firing exercises were included in the war exercises. This suggests they were not a simple "demonstration of armed forces" but drills for a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK. 
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean authorities wantonly violated the sovereignty of the DPRK by abusing the name of the UN. However, they are escalating the military provocations, talking about "additional provocation" and "warning" like a guilty party filing the suit first, pushing the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of war. 
					
					 The prevailing situation goes to prove again that it is necessary to settle accounts with the U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak group of south Korea with arms, not with words.

articles.title: UN "Resolution on Sanctions" against DPRK under Fire
articles.content:
UN "Resolution on Sanctions" against DPRK under Fire
						
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Each time the DPRK launched its satellites for peaceful purposes, the U.S. and its followers made much fuss, terming it "launch of long-range missile".
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says in a bylined article in this regard:
					
					 The U.S. and its followers cooked up the "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK at the UN Security Council though they recognized the successful launch of its satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 at the end of last year.
					
					 They claim that the DPRK's launch of satellite was illegal because it used missile technology.
					
					 They assert there is no problem for other countries to launch their satellites but only the DPRK's satellite launch poses a "threat". This is nothing but sheer sophism.
					
					 The U.S. insistence that the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes is the "launch of long-range missile" though it poses no problem can never be overlooked as a simple expression of jealousy and persecution mania. Herein lie its sinister aims.
					
					 One of the U.S. black-hearted purposes is to justify its moves to establish a missile defence system aimed at dominating the world by making the "missile threat" from the DPRK an established fact.
					
					 Having built a missile shield in Europe in the main, the U.S. has worked hard to build a similar missile shield in East Asia and Mideast in recent years.
					
					 It is the scenario of the U.S. to complete the formation of the siege to countries in the Asia-Pacific region, which it has long pushed forward, in its sinister bid to hold strategic edge and expand the sphere of military domination. Its ulterior aim is to emerge an unchallenged dominator and ruler by putting the Asia-Pacific region under its control in terms of politics, economy and military affairs.
					
					 The DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes can never be a pretext for the U.S. moves to establish MD.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts Japan's Intention to Reexamine "Defense Program Guidelines"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts Japan's Intention to Reexamine "Defense Program Guidelines"
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- The Japanese government led by the Liberal Democratic Party at a recent Cabinet meeting decided to reexamine the "defense program guidelines" which had been worked out in the period of the Democratic Party. According to the decision, new "defense program guidelines" the keynote of which is to increase mobility and strike capability of the "Self-Defense Forces" will be worked out within this year.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 This brought to light the bellicose nature of the Japanese militarist forces set to launch full-scale overseas aggression by turning the SDF into the first-class regular armed forces.
					
					 The "defense program guidelines" are, in essence, a document for reinvasion and a war scenario.
					
					 A Japanese institute for defense studies said in a report that the sphere of military operation of Japan is wider than that of the "Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere," adding that the order "Forward towards Asia-Pacific!" was issued to the SDF.
					
					  This being a hard fact, the Japanese reactionaries seek to revise the "defense program guidelines" as more aggressive ones. This clearly indicates what phase the present Japanese ruling quarters' reckless zeal to launch overseas aggression and war hysteria have reached.
					
					 What is hateful is that the Japanese reactionaries are making great haste to reexamine the "defense program guidelines" under the pretext of the DPRK's "nuclear and missile development".
					
					  This betrays the crafty nature of the Japanese reactionaries accustomed to accusing others to draw water to their mill. They are working hard to realize their old dream of "Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere".
					
					 They recently launched a spy satellite targeted against the DPRK.
					
					 The army and the people of the DPRK are greatly infuriated by Japan's frantic moves to beef up the SDF while groundlessly terming the DPRK's satellite launch a "long-range missile launch".
					
					 It is not a way out for Japan to turn itself into a military giant and launch overseas expansion.

articles.title: Japan's National Chauvinism under Fire
articles.content:
Japan's National Chauvinism under Fire
						
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Recently Korean School in Osaka and Korean students in Aichi Prefecture, Japan separately filed a suit in local courts in Osaka and Nagoya against the Japanese government's attitude of excluding the Koreans schools from the tuition-waiver program for senior high schools. They demanded it apply the program to the Korean schools.
					 Minju Joson Friday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 This was an entirely just action as it is aimed at defending the dignity and right of the Korean nation.
					
					 Such discriminating measure taken by the Japanese government against the Korean schools is a gross violation of the principle of humanitarianism and another serious politically-motivated act of trampling upon the dignity and interests of the Korean nation.
					
					 It is the inveterate evil practice of Japan to look down upon other nations.
					
					 In the past, Japan launched the invasion of Asian countries, advocating the idea of dominating and despising other nations. In this course it committed uncountable hideous crimes against humanity, touching off the resentment of the world people.
					
					 Lurking behind these war crimes was strong national chauvinism.
					
					 Such dangerous national chauvinism lives on in Japan, driving Japanese society into the Right and militarization.
					
					 What is more serious is that the Japanese reactionaries are directing the spearhead of national chauvinism to the DPRK and the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					
					 It is the black-hearted intention of the Japanese reactionaries to impair the international prestige of the DPRK through the moves against it and Chongryon and eventually destabilize Chongryon by putting economic pressure on it.
					
					 They would be well advised to know that they would have to pay a dear price for its actions hostile to the DPRK and for confrontation with it, and would be held accountable for them.
					
					 Japan had better stop such base and sinister actions at once and behave itself.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Army Stages Live-Shell Firing Drill
articles.content:
S. Korea Stages Live-Shell Firing Drill
						
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- The 12th Division of the south Korean puppet army staged a live-shell firing exercise to mount a preemptive strike at the DPRK in Rinje County, south Korean Kangwon Province on Thursday, according to south Korean Yonhap News.
					 The warmongers staged the drill of making a surprise strike at main strongholds of the DPRK with artillery pieces, blustering that they would "turn the enemy's bases of provocations and forces supporting them into ashes through precision strikes."
					
					 Ceaseless north-targeted war drills are being staged in forefront areas at a time when outbursts calling for not ruling out a war and making preemptive strikes are heard from among the warmongers, pushing the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the worst phase.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged to Settle Labor Problem
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged to Settle Labor Problem
						
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions Wednesday made public the results of an opinion poll on labor problem.
					 According to the poll, more than 90 percent of the respondents held that the Lee Myung Bak regime should settle the labor issue before the tenure of its office expires.
					
					 And more than 77 percent of the respondents said that the authorities should conduct the earliest possible state investigation into the situation at Ssangyong Motors where workers were dismissed en masse and indiscriminately suppressed.
					
					 Majority of the respondents held that the enterprises should stop accusing and charging the striking workers with offenses, threatening them with compensation for damage, etc., immediately reinstate the dismissed workers and turn the part-time jobs into regular ones.
					
					 The confederation urged the authorities to immediately opt for solving the labor problem, warning that they will face strong protest in case they turn down these demands.

articles.title: Drug-related Crimes Hit Record High in S. Korea
articles.content:
Drug-related Crimes Hit Record High in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Yonhap News reported about the steady increase in drug-related crimes in south Korea.
					 According to the report of the Customs Agency on Feb. 6, the number of drug smuggling cases seized last year increased 33 percent as against the previous year in south Korea.
					
					 This is the highest record as it is more than 7 times that of 2004.

articles.title: Day of Shining Marked in Far Eastern Region of Russia
articles.content:
Day of Shining Marked in Far Eastern Region of Russia
						
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in the Far Eastern Region of Russia held an event in Nakhodka City on Monday. It was to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 On displayed in the venue of the event were a photo of Kim Jong Il inspecting a unit of the Korean People's Army and photos of him and the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un giving field guidance to different fields of national economy.
					
					 Displayed there were a photo of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun, sacred temple of Juche, works of Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un and books dealing with their greatness.
					
					 The participants laid floral baskets and bouquets before a full-length painting of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il before paying tribute to them.
					
					 Messages of greeting to Kim Jong Un were conveyed to the DPRK consul general in Nakhodka.
					
					 Speakers praised Kim Jong Il as the peerlessly brilliant commander and peerless patriot who frustrated all the persistent moves of the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces to stifle the DPRK with his outstanding Songun revolutionary leadership and fully demonstrated the dignity and glory of the country and the nation.
					
					 Kim Jong Il is alive in the hearts of the world progressives as he performed extraordinary feats for the cause of national reunification and the human cause of independence, they said.
					
					 Saying that Marshal Kim Jong Un is the people's leader possessed of the matchless pluck and grit, outstanding commanding ability and noble outlook on posterity, they noted with high appreciation that he has been admired as the greatest man in the world.
					
					 The DPRK remains undaunted as it is led by Kim Jong Un though the U.S. and other hostile forces make much fuss over the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes, they said, adding only victory and glory are in store for the DPRK.
					
					 The participants looked round photos and books on display and watched video "The World Saw the DPRK in 2012".

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated by Koreans in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated by Koreans in Russia 
						
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was inaugurated by the United Confederation of Koreans in Khabarovsk, Russia on Feb. 2. 
					 Choe Song Jong, chairman of the confederation, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee. 
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to hold colorful events including seminar and lecture on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Bangladesh
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Bangladesh
						
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- A Bangladeshi preparatory committee to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was inaugurated in Dakha on February 3.
					 MD. Harun-Ar-Rashid, chairman of the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 It was discussed and decided at the committee that the progressive political parties and organizations, friendship and solidarity organizations with the Korean people and organizations for the study of the Juche idea in Bangladesh would organize diverse political and cultural events including meeting and seminar praising the revolutionary career and immortal exploits of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Belarus
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Belarus
						
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- A Belorussian preparatory committee to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was inaugurated on February 1.
					 The preparatory committee was made up of representatives of the Communist Workers' Party of Belarus, the Belarus-DPRK National Friend Association Named after Kim Il Sung, the National Social Federation "for the Union and Union's Communist Party" and the Social Association "for Democracy, Social Progress and Justice".
					
					 L. Shkolinikov, chairman of the Permanent Committee of the Belarus-DPRK National Friend Association Named after Kim Il Sung, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 It decided to organize diverse political and cultural events including meeting and seminar praising the revolutionary career and immortal exploits of Kim Jong Il and issue a special bulletin on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Russia
						
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of Karelia, Russia to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was inaugurated on January 31.
					 Viktor Yegorov, chairman of the Karelia-DPRK Friendship Association of Russia, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 It decided to organize diverse political and cultural events praising the exploits of Kim Jong Il in the period between February 1 and 20.

articles.title: Bangladeshi Figure Praises Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Bangladeshi Figure Praises Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Garib Newaz, president of the Bangladesh People's League who doubles as chairman of the Bangladesh Self-Reliance Research Centre, released a statement on February 3 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 He said:
					
					 The world progressive people significantly mark the 71st birth anniversary of great HE Kim Jong Il together with the Korean people.
					
					 Kim Jong Il was a great statesman and revolutionary who led the revolution and construction to victory after victory for a long period with his brilliant wisdom, outstanding ideas and theories and faith in Juche.
					
					 He comprehensively developed the immortal Juche idea and Songun idea founded by President Kim Il Sung and glorified them as the guiding idea in the era of independence through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities.
					
					 He was a distinguished leader of the Korean people and world progressives struggling for independence.
					
					 The Songun politics pursued by the dear respected Kim Jong Un, creditable successor to the revolutionary cause of Kim Jong Il, will bring a greater victory and glory to the Korean people and world progressives.

articles.title: Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Exploits Held Abroad
articles.content:
Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Exploits Held Abroad
						
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Seminars on leader Kim Jong Il's exploits took place in Italy and Malaysia on February 1 and 2.
					 Constanzi Franco, member of the leadership of the Leftwing People's Party of Communists of Italy who doubles as secretary general of the Italian Committee for the Study of the Juche idea, said:
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il was the great leader who was revered by all people.
					
					 The DPRK has dynamically advanced along the way of victory under the uplifted banner of socialism, a clear proof of the validity and vitality of his idea.
					
					 The Korean people are successfully waging the drive for building a thriving socialist nation, closely united around the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The department director of a district committee of Rome City of the Communist Party of Italy noted that while reading immortal works of Kim Jong Il he clearly realized the faith in the victory of socialism and the invincible might of the single-minded unity whereby the leader, the party and masses formed a harmonious whole.
					
					 The general manager of the M.K.P. Company of Malaysia stated that all the eye-opening successes achieved in the DPRK are the brilliant fruition of Kim Jong Il's brilliant wisdom, matchless pluck and indefatigable and energetic leadership.

articles.title: Peruvian Figure Demands Withdrawal of UN "Resolution"
articles.content:
Peruvian Figure Demands Withdrawal of UN "Resolution"
						
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Genaro Ledesma Izquieta, chairman of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru, sent letters to the UN Security Council, the U.S. government and the south Korean puppet government on Feb. 1 respectively in protest against the UN Security Council's "resolution" against the DPRK over its satellite launch for peaceful purposes.
					 The letter said:
					
					 We demand the UNSC withdraw the "resolution" against the DPRK over its satellite launch.
					
					 It was legitimate and necessary for the DPRK to launch a satellite for earth observation for peaceful purposes just as other countries did to conquer space.
					
					 The Korean people made great technological progress by putting its own satellite into orbit.
					
					 However, the DPRK is exposed to threat due to the UNSC's "resolution on sanctions" to hamstring its efforts to build an economic power.
					
					 The UNSC is severely violating the sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					 In this regard we serve a warning to the UNSC.
					
					 It should know the Korean people value sovereignty more than their own lives.
					
					 The UNSC's "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK is a manifestation of the most barbarous hostile policy towards it as the "resolution" was adopted under the pressure of the U.S.
					
					 The Korean nation is now facing the danger of a new war due to the U.S.
					
					 War will bring a great disaster to humankind desirous of a peaceful life.

articles.title: Russian Political Party Denounces UN "Resolution"
articles.content:
Russian Political Party Denounces UN "Resolution"
						
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- The Party for Peace and Unity of Russia released a statement on Jan. 29 in denunciation of the UN Security Council's "resolution" against the legitimate satellite launch in the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The Party for Peace and Unity of Russia unequivocally supports the DPRK's success in launching satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 and its efforts to conquer vast space.
					
					 We call upon international organizations to recognize the peaceful nature of the DPRK's launch of scientific and technological satellite and maintain objectivity.
					
					 It is a legitimate right publicly recognized by international law for each sovereign country to launch satellites.
					
					 What matters is that activities for conquering space for peaceful purposes are being misinterpreted as "launches of long-range ballistic missiles" by some specified countries.
					
					 Space, common property of humankind, should not be allowed to belong to the specified countries.
					
					 We are sure that the Korean people's peaceful program for exploring space will be successfully implemented in the future, too.
					
					 Nothing can block the triumphant advance of the DPRK that has made rapid progress, guided by the Juche idea and Songun politics.

articles.title: Demo against U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK Held in Chile
articles.content:
Demo against U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK Held in Chile
						
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- There took place in Santiago City, Chile on Feb. 1 a demo against the U.S. moves for stifling the DPRK under the sponsorship of the Communist Party of Chile (Proletarian Action).
					 Hundreds of people took part in the demo including the first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Chile (Proletarian Action) and other members of the party leadership, party members of the city and members of trade union.
					
					 A statement of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Communist Party of Chile (Proletarian Action) was read out at the beginning of the demo.
					
					 The UN Security Council now moves under the control of the U.S. to deprive the DPRK of its inviolable right to explore space, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 It is quite natural that the Korean people brand the UNSC as a tool and puppet serving the U.S. 
					
					 This resolute and just estimation represents the Koreans' firm will and intention to defend the national dignity and not to allow the interference in their internal affairs.
					
					 There is no doubt that the UN is applying the double standards by which it keeps silence about some countries possessing lots of A-bombs, long-range missiles and weapons of mass destruction and constantly violating the UN resolutions. 
					
					 We call on the world people aspiring after independence and socialism against imperialism to add their voices to the growing chorus against the U.S. imperialists' moves against the DPRK.
					
					 We will stand by the Korean people led by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The demonstrators marched along the street from the U.S. embassy in Santiago de Chile, holding the DPRK's flag and placards that read "We Support People's Korea" and "Down with U.S. Imperialism!" and chanting anti-U.S. slogans.

articles.title: Dissolution of "UN Command" Urged by Nepali Organization
articles.content:
Dissolution of "UN Command" Urged by Nepali Organization
						
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- The Nepali Committee for Promotion of Reunification of Korea called for the dissolution of the "UN Command" in a statement on Jan. 29.
					 The statement expressed great concerns about the worst situation on the Korean Peninsula created by the U.S. scheme to disguise the "UN Command" as the "multinational force command" for the purpose of keeping the state of armistice on the peninsula and disturbing the peace and security there.
					
					 The U.S. allegation that the increase of the defence capability in the DPRK escalates the regional tension is nothing but rhetoric to cover up the aggressive nature of its Asia-Pacific strategy, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Whether the "UN Command" is dissolved immediately or not is a touchstone showing whether the U.S. desires peace and stability in the Asia-Pacific region or seeks to revive the Cold War and maintain its hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK is working to ensure the peace and stability in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world as well as on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 We urge the U.S. to come out for the talks with the DPRK.
					
					 We demand the south Korean authorities, political parties and public organizations consent to the proposal advanced by the DPRK for the removal of the tension between the north and the south.
					
					 We appeal to the political parties, public organizations, international organizations and progressives all over the world desirous of justice, truth and peace to extend full support and solidarity to the Koreans' struggle to reunify the country independently and peacefully by their concerted efforts.

articles.title: Korean Book, Photo and Fine Arts Exhibition Opens in China
articles.content:
Korean Book, Photo and Fine Arts Exhibition Opens in China
						
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- An exhibition of Korean book, photo and fine arts opened in Shanghai, China with due ceremony on Tuesday to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 On display in the venue were photos on the revolutionary activities of Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The works of the peerlessly great men and books, photos, videos and fine arts that show the Korean people's efforts to build a thriving socialist country were also on show.
					
					 Speeches were made at the opening ceremony.
					
					 The speakers said this exhibition would offer a good occasion for helping the Chinese know more about the mentality and culture of the Koreans and for boosting mutual understanding and friendship.
					
					 They voiced their hope for more exchanges between the two countries in the field of culture.
					
					 They also expressed their conviction that the Korean people would make bigger achievements in the building of a thriving socialist country, rallied close around Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The exhibition will go on till Feb. 20.

articles.title: Kimjongilia Show Held in Shenyang
articles.content:
Kimjongilia Show Held in Shenyang
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- A Kimjongilia show for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was held in Shenyang, China on Feb. 4 under the sponsorship of the General Association of Koreans in China.
					 Present there were officials of the General Association of Koreans in China including Chairwoman Choe Un Bok, Koreans in China, the consul general and members of the DPRK consulate-general in Shenyang and officials of Liaoning Province, China.
					
					 Speeches were made at the show. 
					
					 The speakers said that immortal are the feats of Kim Jong Il, who made great contributions to strengthening the DPRK-China friendship with his energetic foreign activities.
					
					 Kimjongilia, flower praising the great man, will shine as the famous flower in the world and bloom in the minds of world progressives and Koreans in China, they noted.
					
					 They expressed belief that the Korean people will achieve greater success in the building of a thriving nation under the leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un this year.

articles.title: Kimjongilia Show Held in Dalian City of China
articles.content:
Kimjongilia Show Held in Dalian City of China
						
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- A Kimjongilia show for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was held in Dalian City, Liaoning Province, China on Feb. 3.
					 On display in its venue were more than 600 potted Kimjongilias with a large-scale art work depicting Jongil Peak and snow-covered Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan secret camp in the background.
					
					 Seen in the venue were diplomas and gold medals which were awarded to the flower at international festivals, and photos and books related to the immortal flower.
					
					 Present there were personages of different social standings including the Dalian City Committee of the Communist Party of China, the Dalian City People's Congress, the Dalian City People's Government, the Dalian City Flower Association and masses.
					
					 Present there on invitation were officials of the DPRK consulate-general in Shenyang and different units operational in Dalian.
					
					 Speeches were made and congratulatory performance was given at the show.

articles.title: Otorgados titulos de Heroe de Trabajo a miembros de Seguridad de Pueblo
articles.content:
Otorgados titulos de Heroe de Trabajo a miembros de Seguridad de Pueblo 
						
Pyongyang, 8 de febrero (ACNC) -- Quedaron otorgados los titulos del Heroe del Trabajo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea a Ri Kwang Chol y Ri Chung Gon, miembros de la unidad adscrita a la Estacion de Seguridad del Pueblo de la ciudad de Songrim de la provincia de Hwanghae del Norte quienes sacrificaron sus vidas para salvar a los obreros en una inesperada situacion peligrosa. 
					Tuvo lugar el dia 8 la ceremonia de otorgamiento en la ciudad de Sariwon de esta provincia con la participacion del jefe de la Direccion Politica del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, Ri Pyong Sam, el secretario responsable del Comite del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en la provincia mencionada, Pak Thae Dok y otros funcionarios concernientes, los miembros de Seguridad del Pueblo y los familiares de los difuntos. 
					
					Fueron transmitidos a los familiares de los difuntos los titulos del Heroe del Trabajo de la RPDC y la Medalla de Oro "El Martillo y la Hoz" junto con la Orden Bandera Nacional de primera clase. 
					
					Tambien se les entregaron los certificados de martir patriotico.

articles.title: Otorgada Orden Kim Jong Il a varias unidades, funcionarios, uniformados y trabajadores
articles.content:
Otorgada Orden Kim Jong Il a varias unidades, funcionarios, uniformados y trabajadores
						
Pyongyang, 8 de febrero (ACNC) -- En ocasion del dia de natalicio del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, quedo otorgada la Orden Kim Jong Il al Complejo de Maquinaria de Rakwon de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte, la Mina Juventud 5 de Marzo de la provincia de Jagang, la Fabrica de Ropas Unha de Kanggye, la Granja Cooperativa de Migok de la ciudad de Sariwon de la provincia de Hwanghae del Norte, asi como a Paek Kye Ryong, O Su Yong, Kim Chang Myong, Ro Kyong Jun, Choe Tae Il, Pak Cho Yong, Ryom Chi Gwon, Kang Kil Yong, Mi Chang Guk, Yun Ho Nam, U Tok Su y Ryom U Jun, respectivamente.
					Las entidades, funcionarios, militares y trabajadores arriba mencionados contribuyeron grandemente a fortalecer el poderio de defensa nacional y la construccion de la potencia economica al consolidar la base ideo-politica de la revolucion coreana agrupando a inmensas masas en torno al partido y desplegar activamente la lucha por materializar la linea y politica del partido en acato a la direccion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun.
					
					Quedo publicado el dia 6 el decreto correspondiente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.

articles.title: Otorgado Premio Kim Jong Il a Kim Sang Ok y "Enciclopedia Kwangmyong"
articles.content:
Otorgado Premio Kim Jong Il a Kim Sang Ok y "Enciclopedia Kwangmyong"
						
Pyongyang, 8 de febrero (ACNC) -- En ocasion del dia de natalicio del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, quedo otorgado el Premio Kim Jong Il a Kim Sang Ok y a la "Enciclopedia Kwangmyong".
					Kim Sang Ok contribuyo al desarrollo cientifico-tecnico del pais trabajando con gran fidelidad al partido y al lider, excepcional creatividad y pasion.
					
					La "Enciclopedia Kwangmyong" sirvio para elevar el nivel politico-teorico y el cultural de los funcionarios y trabajadores como lo exigen la causa de construccion de un Estado prospero socialista y la epoca de economia basada en intelectualidad.
					
					Quedo publicado el dia 6 el decreto correspondiente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.

articles.title: Inaugurada exposicion fotografica en homenaje al Dia de Estrella Luz
articles.content:
Inaugurada exposicion fotografica en homenaje al Dia de Estrella Luz
						
Pyongyang, 8 de febrero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del dia de natalicio del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, quedo iniciada este viernes en el Palacio de Estudio del Pueblo la exposicion central de fotos "Siempre estuvieron juntos en el camino por la felicidad del pueblo". 
					En la sede se exhiben las fotos que muestran la vida revolucionaria de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y las actividades revolucionarias del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Las fotos tituladas "El Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il dirigiendo las sesiones del VI Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea", "El Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il viendo un entrenamiento de los militares del Ejercito Popular de Corea" y otras reflejan las proezas de direccion de esos grandes hombres sin iguales quienes fortalecieron por todos los medios el Partido del Trabajo de Corea y elevaron el poderio de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias. 
					
					"El Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il viendo los accesorios de los equipos a ser enviados a las minas carboniferas", "El Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il dirigiendo en el terreno la construccion del Complejo Hidraulico del Mar Oeste" y otras fotos transmiten los incansables esfuerzos fisicos y mentales de los Generalisimos por la prosperidad de la patria y la felicidad del pueblo. 
					
					Ademas, se ven las fotos alusivas a las hazanas de ellos realizadas por lograr la gran unidad nacional, la paz y estabilidad del mundo y la amistad y solidaridad entre los pueblos bajo la bandera de independencia antiimperialista. 
					
					Saltan a la vista otras ejemplares como "El Mariscal Kim Jong Un rinde sublime homenaje a los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il ante sus retratos con amplia sonrisa en el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan" y "El Mariscal Kim Jong Un visita el Centro de Control General de Satelites para observar el proceso de lanzamiento de la unidad no. 2 del satelite artificial de la Tierra 'Kwangmyongsong-3'". 
					
					En la ceremonia de inauguracion participaron Kim Ki Nam, Yang Hyong Sop, los funcionarios interesados y los trabajadores capitalinos.
